name: WP Hotel Booking Stripe Payment
author: ThimPress

sections.description:
WP Hotel Booking is a WordPress Hotel Booking Plugin by ThimPress.

WP Hotel Booking Stripe Payment supports Stripe payment method for WP Hotel Booking plugin.

One-Time Discount – 10 Days Left

** Announcing:** NEW Hotel WP Theme – 100% Woocommerce compatible, only $64
or The Ultimate Sailing Hotel, using by 1500 hotels, $64 Only

Hotel WordPress Themes

Take a look at the Premium HotelWP – Hotel WordPress Theme and Hotel Sailing Theme we designed to work with WP Hotel Booking, all developers are welcome to develop WordPress Hotel Theme based on this awesome Hotel Booking plugin for WordPress. More WordPress Hotel Themes will come soon, both free WordPress themes as well as premium WordPress themes for this hotel booking / reservation plugin.

Other free add-ons for WP Hotel Booking are available in WordPress:

  • Authorize.Net Payment method for WP Hotel Booking – Authorize.Net payment method for WP Hotel Booking Plugin.
  • Block booking for WP Hotel Booking – Block booking rooms of WP Hotel Booking for specific dates.
  • Booking in single room for WP Hotel Booking – Booking in single room for WP Hotel Booking Plugin.
  • Statistic for WP Hotel Booking – Statistic booking for WP Hotel Booking Plugin.
  • Coupon for WP Hotel Booking – Coupon for WP Hotel Booking Plugin.
  • Woocommerce payment method for WP Hotel Booking – Support paying for booking of WP Hotel Booking plugin with the payment system provided by WooCommerce..
  • WPML for WP Hotel Booking – Multilnguage CMS support for WP Hotel Booking Plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)

From your WordPress dashboard
1. Visit ‘Plugin > Add new’.
2. Search for ‘WP Hotel Booking Stripe Payment’.
3. Activate WP Hotel Booking Stripe Payment from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org
1. Search, select and download WP Hotel Booking Stripe Payment.
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Dashboard.
sections.changelog:
1.7.9 (2024-10-21)

~ Fixed: not save setting.

1.7.8 (2024-01-12)

~ Tweak: use Stripe JS iframe Form Powered by Stripe, instead of write form.
~ Use Stripe SDK PHP v7.128.0.
~ Use Stripe SDK JS v1.54.2.

1.7.7

~ Fix SCA

1.7.6

~ Fix security.

1.7.5

  • Updated language file.

1.7.4

  • Fix issue Stripe checkout: No such customer

1.7.3

  • Improve structure

1.7.2

  • Update redirect thank you page

1.7.1

  • Publish WP Hotel Booking Stripe Payment to WordPress
